name: Loan Sanction
subject: Loan Sanction

message:
Dear {{ doc.full_name or "" }},

{% if doc.loan_application.status == 'Failure' %} Sorry! Your loan application was turned down since the Pledge request was not successful.
We regret the inconvenience caused. {% endif %} {% if doc.loan_application.status == 'Success' %} Congratulations! Your loan application has been approved. Please e-sign the loan agreement to avail the loan now. {% endif %} {% if doc.loan_application.status == 'Partial Success' %} Congratulations! Your loan application is being considered favourable by our lending partner.
However, the pledge request was partially successful and finally accepted at Rs. {{ doc.loan_application.current_total_collateral_value }}. against the request value of Rs. {{doc.requested_total_collateral_value}}.
Accordingly the final loan amount sanctioned is Rs. {{doc.loan_application.sanctioned_amount}}.
Please e-sign the loan agreement to avail the loan now. {% endif %}

Thanks,

The Spark Team
name: Loan Application
subject: Loan Application
